name: The Boss VimJam 2 Boss [8 Bits to Infinity]
name_original: The Boss VimJam 2 Boss [8 Bits to Infinity]
description:
I'm Guy Donohue and and a University Student of Worcester University in the UK and been studying Bachelor of Science in Computer Science for the past 2 years, and hopping to graduate in 2022 and I'm the owner of Games UK Studios one man team 

I started game development back in 2016 and for the past 5 years I learned rigging, 3d modelling, animation, Level Design, Character Design, Clothing Design, and of course I been learning the Unreal Engine 4.

Other Skills 

  • Dedicated Server networking (PC Games)
  • Website Design
  • Blueprint coding (Unreal Engine 4)

The Challenge

 Challenging Part Of the Project was just the AI alone the AI can be very temperamental and difficult to programme within the short deadline of just a week all I had to programme a custom sight for the AI

Limitations 

They are no in game settings menu for the quality and sound in the actual game level they are boundary limits you can't go beyond the hills and the helicopter pad boundaries 

Custom Models

I had time to create custom buildings and had time to create Custom Characters

Custom animations

Special thanks to my sponsor reallusion.com for sponsoring me for 3dXchange7 so that i could export custom Animations from Iclone7 where all done by me one man team thanks to my sponsor i was able to create the dead animation of The Boss.

Custom Clothing 

Every Character including the AI have Custom Made Clothing so that they look totally different from each other.

Programming

All the programming was done by my self  had no help at all for the cinematics was in the main level of the project the Main Character was a separate class 

Donations

Any Tips or Donations I will receive will go towards the music costs and towards the required equipment that is needed to do a online multiplayer build version towards a dedicated server for 1000  players.

The Main Character

The Main Character is a Real Life Person of the USA Citizen that came over to the UK for a Holiday and then found him self in a lot of trouble 

Social Media

Follow me on my Social Media and interact with me in my discord and Twitch where i do game development live.
